name: The Exit Strategy
description:
Made for the Wanna X Yam Jam 2022.

Unfortunately I ended up being a lot busier than I would have wanted during the main portion of the jam, so a lot of stuff got cut, but I do think the style / general idea could be expanded into something interesting.

The solution to the second room is admittedly not very well designed, so don't feel too bad if you don't piece it together.
